name: Sweet Tomato
description: Sweet Tomato Halal Family Restaurant is a decent if slightly expensive option in Pettah, across from the Red Mosque. Down 2nd Cross Street, this clean and friendly establishment serves a decent biriyani at the rather high price of Rs. 400. They also do fried rice and rice and curry.
tip: Be prepared for an above average bill.
review:
Sweet Tomato Halal Family Restaurant is a decent if slightly expensive option in Pettah, across from the Red Mosque. Down 2nd Cross Street, this clean and friendly establishment serves a decent biriyani at the rather high price of Rs. 400. They also do fried rice and rice and curry.
